original_title: DC man thanks Trump for making the streets safe again.   — The Donald
article_summary: DC man expresses gratitude towards Trump for making the streets safer, sparking a debate on race, personal responsibility, and the role of spirituality in addressing crime. Some commenters argue it's not a race issue, but a matter of good versus evil, while others question the burden placed on certain communities to combat crime. The conversation also touches on the impact of trauma, the role of prayer, and the potential benefits of welfare reform in improving the black family unit.</s>
